Atap SD di Pasuruan Ambruk, Nadiem Kirim Tim Investigasi
06 Nov 2019, 12:01 by Moh Khory Alfarizi, Yudono Yanuar
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Menteri Pendidikan dan Kebudayaan Nadiem Makarim tidak hanya mengucapkan duka cita atas musibah ambruknya atap gedung Sekolah Dasar Negeri Gentong, Kota Pasuruan, Jawa Timur, yang menyebabkan seorang guru dan seorang murid tewas. Nadiem juga mengirimkan tim untuk melakukan investigasi
"Pertama yang saya ingin ucapkan adalah untuk SD di Pasuruan itu saya ucapkan bela sungkawa kepada keluarga korban. Saya sudah mengirim tim dari Inspektorat Jendral untuk pergi ke sana dan menginvestigasi," ujar Nadiem setelah rapat kerja dengan Anggota DPR Komisi X, di Kompleks Parlemen Jakarta, Rabu, 6 November 2019.
Selain menyebabkan korban tewas, insiden yang terjadi Selasa pagi, 5 November 2019 ini, juga menyebabkan 11 murid lainnya cedera. Atap yang ambruk merupakan bangunan kelas 2A, 2B, 5A, dan 5B. Atap terbuat dari genteng dan rangka galvalum.
Korban meninggal adalah Irza Almira, 8 tahun, dan guru Sevina Arsy Wijaya.
"Ini merupakan suatu tragedi yang sangat menyedihkan dan saya sudah berbicara dengan Wakil Walikota Pasuruan, kami komit untuk mendukung Pemda untuk menyelesaikan investigasinya," kata Pendiri GoJek itu.
Selain itu, Nadiem juga akan memastikan bagaimana rencana ke depan untuk menghindari agar peristiwa seperti ini tidak terjadi lagi.
Sebelumnya, Gubernur Jawa Timur Khofifah Indar Parawansa menjenguk korban akibat atap kelas roboh di SDN Gentong. "Yang menjadi perhatian adalah pelayanan psikososial kepada korban. Saya kira itu yang perlu dilakukan," katanya seusai menjenguk korban di RS dr Soedarsono, Kota Pasuruan, Selasa.
Ia telah berkoordinasi dengan Dinas Kesehatan Provinsi Jawa Timur jika memang ada korban yang harus mendapatkan rujukan ke Rumah Sakit dr Sutomo di Surabaya. Dirinya juga memerintahkan jangan sampai ada korban yang dipungut biaya atas peristiwa ambruknya sebagian atap sekolah tersebut.
Saat ini, pengusutan ambruknya bangunan sudah ditangani Polda Jawa Timur dan Polres Pasuruan. Kabid Humas Polda Jatim Kombes Pol Frans Barung Mangera mengatakan, polisi akan memeriksa pihak terkait ambruknya Sekolah Dasar Gentong, seperti kontraktor hingga kepala Dinas Pendidikan Kota Pasuruan.
"Itu pasti (hubungan dengan kontraktor) tetapi tunggu identifikasi ya. Pemanggilan kepala dinas dan lainnya juga segera," ucapnya, seperti dikutip Antara, baru-baru ini.
Berita lain terkait Nadiem Makarim dan sekolah rusak, bisa Anda simak di Tempo.co.

Roofing elementary school in Pasuruan Collapsing, Nadiem Sends Investigation Team
06 Nov 2019, 12:01 by Moh Khory Alfarizi, Yudono Yanuar
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Minister of Education and Culture Nadiem Makarim not only expressed condolences over the tragedy of the roof collapse of the Gentong State Elementary School building, Pasuruan City, East Java, which caused a teacher and a student to die. Nadiem also sent a team to conduct an investigation
"The first thing I want to say is for elementary schools in Pasuruan, I say my condolences to the families of the victims. I have sent a team from the Inspectorate General to go there and investigate," Nadiem said after a working meeting with members of the House of Representatives Commission X, in the Jakarta Parliament Complex , Wednesday, November 6 2019.
In addition to causing casualties, the incident that occurred Tuesday morning, 5 November 2019, also caused 11 other students to be injured. The collapsed roof is a class 2A, 2B, 5A, and 5B building. The roof is made of tile and galvalum frame.
The dead victims are Irza Almira, 8 years old, and teacher Sevina Arsy Wijaya.
"This is a very sad tragedy and I have spoken with the Deputy Mayor of Pasuruan, we are committed to supporting the local government to complete its investigation," said GoJek's founder.
In addition, Nadiem will also make sure how to plan ahead to prevent events like this from happening again.
Previously, East Java Governor Khofifah Indar Parawansa visited the victim due to the class roof collapsing at Gentong Elementary School. "The concern is psychosocial services to the victims. I think that's what needs to be done," he said after visiting the victims at Dr Soedarsono Hospital, Pasuruan City, Tuesday.
He has coordinated with the East Java Provincial Health Office if there were indeed victims who had to get a referral to Dr. Sutomo's Hospital in Surabaya. He also ordered that no victims be charged the cost of the partial collapse of the school roof.
At present, the investigation into the collapse of the building has been handled by the East Java Regional Police and Pasuruan Regional Police. Head of East Java Regional Police Public Relations Commissioner Pol Frans Barung Mangera said the police would examine related parties to the collapse of the Gentong Elementary School, such as contractors to the head of the Pasuruan City Education Office.
"That is certain (the relationship with the contractor), but wait for the identification, yes. Calling the head of the office and others is also immediate," he said, as quoted by Antara recently.
Other news related to Nadiem Makarim and the damaged school, you can refer to Tempo.co.
